title: Adobe Acrobat & PDF Issues
description: Troubleshooting problems with opening, editing, or signing PDF documents.

steps.title: Restart Application
steps.instruction: Close all Adobe windows. Check Task Manager to ensure no background 'Acrobat' processes are running, then reopen.

steps.title: Repair Installation
steps.instruction: Open Adobe Acrobat, go to the 'Help' menu, and select 'Repair Installation'. Restart your computer after it finishes.

steps.title: Update Application
steps.instruction: Go to 'Help' > 'Check for Updates' to ensure you are on the latest patch version.

steps.title: Default App Settings
steps.instruction: Right-click a PDF file > Open with > Choose another app > Select Adobe Acrobat > Check 'Always use this app to open .pdf files'.

steps.title: Ticket Preparation
steps.instruction: If issues persist, raise a ticket with: Screenshot of error message, Adobe Version, and whether it affects all files or just one.
